title: PG’s Return, Giannis’s MVP Moment, and the Lakers Chase for 10th | Group Chat
description:
Justin, Rob, and Wos recap Paul George’s return to the Clippers and how that can change the Western Conference playoffs, whether the Lakers should fight for a play-in spot, the 76ers' chances going into the playoffs, and the state of the Knicks.

Hosts: Justin Verrier, Rob Mahoney, Wosny Lambre
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
